See [http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/eagleUp/TouScruino-arm-ui2.skp SketchUp file] to get other views of the board.<br>

==Features==
 * Arduino Uno footprint with (almost) compatible pin numbering on the edge.
 * Teensy 3.1 module, with USB and PROG pins broken down on the card edge
 * LiPo charger with JST 2 battery plug.
 * 3.3V 500mA regulator
 * 2.8" TFT screen with backlight
<br>
